Hero.headline: 75% of People Fear Public Speaking
Hero.subtext: Expensive classes, judgmental eyes, lack of time. Master your speech alone perfectly with Speech Up.

Projects.title: Why Speech Up?
Projects.subtitle: 3 Core Features that Transform Your Speaking

benefit1.title: Real-time AI Feedback
benefit1.desc: AI analyzes pronunciation, speed, intonation, and emphasis in real-time to provide instant, actionable feedback.

benefit2.title: Tailored Training Courses
benefit2.desc: We provide customized scripts and curriculums for interviews, presentations, and daily conversations.

benefit3.title: Data-Driven Growth Reports
benefit3.desc: Visually track your improvement with before/after recordings and detailed performance analytics.

FeaturedProject.demoDescription: Discover the 4-step workflow of our AI-powered real-time speech coaching solution.
FeaturedProject.step1Description: Choose between Script Speech and Impromptu Speech. Each mode offers customized training tailored to your needs.
FeaturedProject.step1Feature1: Script Speech: Practice with prepared content
FeaturedProject.step1Feature2: Impromptu Speech: Present on the spot like real life
FeaturedProject.step2Description: Select scenarios for business, interviews, presentations and more. Adjust difficulty and duration to match your level.
FeaturedProject.step3Description: Our AI generates personalized scripts in real-time based on your selected settings.
FeaturedProject.step3Feature2: Natural scenarios suited to your situation
FeaturedProject.step4Description: Practice with the generated script and receive instant AI feedback on your performance.
FeaturedProject.step4Feature2: Detailed feedback on clarity, pace, filler words
FeaturedProject.ctaDescription: Grow into a confident speaker with Speech Up. Your first week is free.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: We specialize in building AI-powered products that make a difference.
Services.aiProductDescription: Crafting AI workflows optimized for user experience beyond simple integration.
Services.mobileDescription: Delivering seamless and robust high-performance app experiences for both iOS & Android.
Services.infraDescription: Building stable, cloud-based foundations that grow with your business.
Services.consultingDescription: Not sure how AI can help your business? We'll help you identify opportunities, develop a roadmap, and implement solutions that deliver real ROI.

Philosophy.description: We eliminate the unnecessary to focus on essential value. From the first spark of an idea to the moment of growth, we are your dedicated technical partner.
Philosophy.transparencyDescription: Clear communication, honest timelines, and no hidden surprises.
Philosophy.qualityDescription: We write clean, maintainable code that stands the test of time.
Philosophy.partnershipDescription: We grow with you and adapt to your evolving needs.

Contact.description: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Get in touch and let's explore how we can help bring your vision to life.
Contact.responseTime: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

Footer.tagline: Expanding Human Potential through Code. Building AI-powered solutions that make a difference.
